channel.title: Need Help With Server [LOTS OF PICS]
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Ok if you are going to help me thankyou! i really appreciate it[/size] [size=20pt]I PUT A LOT OF EFFORT INTO THIS SO I HOPE THIS WILL GET SOLVED[/size] ______________________________ READ THIS FIRST OK underneath are a whole bunch of pictures that show what my current variables,portforward etc... are like If you are nice post a comment saying it might be easier if you gave me a picture of your (Whatever)
ALSO OF YOU HELP ME YOU WILL BE GRANTED WITH CO-OWNER ON MY SERVER IF YOU LIKE AND I WILL THANK YOU FOR ETERNITY!
________________ Ok Lets Get Started
Here is a picture of my Environmental Variables | IF SOMETHING IS WRONG TELL ME | [IMG]http://img377.imageshack.us/img377/7002/enviromentalvariablesww2.jpg[/img]
Here is a picture of my Port forwarding (I Have D-Link) | IF SOMETHING IS WRONG TELL ME | [IMG]http://img186.imageshack.us/img186/3766/portforwardlt4.jpg[/img]
Here is a picture of my Firewall Allow Thingy | IF SOMETHING IS WRONG TELL ME | [IMG]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/7681/firewallji2.jpg[/img]
Here is a picture of my Run bat for proof that the server is online ( I edited server.java so it would say my server name) [IMG]http://img205.imageshack.us/img205/8269/runbataz0.jpg[/img]
Here is a picture of my IPCONFIG in cmd | IF THERE IS ANY ERRORS PLZ TELL MEEE | [IMG]http://img159.imageshack.us/img159/3739/ipconfigrs2.jpg[/img]
Here is a picture of my No-ip DUC v2.2.1 [IMG]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/8466/noipax7.jpg[/img]
[size=25pt]AND FINALY THE RESULTS![/size] [IMG]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/2017/finalfc7.jpg[/img]
All tho i heard that just because you ip doesnt work for you doesnt mean it wont work for someone else. But it would be nice if you could (i dont know if this is considered advertising) but yeah
[size=18pt]I WOULD GREATLY APRECIATE YOU IF YOU HELPED![/size]
[size=19pt]I will rep++ in the future if i ever get 15 rep and thats a promice if you help and my server will work (also get co-owner if you like)[/size]

item.title: Need Help With Server [LOTS OF PICS]
item.dc:creator: @Jayar1 Jayar_
item.description:
@Jayar1 wrote:

[quote=“ihackgames, post:10, topic:235903”]lol u dont put in ur server ip when u host it
try loging in without your server ip[/quote]
i know but other people cant log in with my ip
thats what this post is about

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Server [LOTS OF PICS]

item.title: Need Help With Server [LOTS OF PICS]
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

I wouldn’t suggest doing portforwarding cause It’s a pain in the butt…

I’d just do hamachi and look at you’re IP (at the top) and change the IP you got
(jayar.no-ip.biz)

I just think it’s 10x Easier

I’d just use hamachi for now and if you’d like to try and figure port forward later

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Server [LOTS OF PICS]

item.description:
@sabsabi wrote:

linksys ftw…anyways if it doesnt work try utorrent method, did u firewall and shit?

Read full topic

how do i get or check them

item.title: Need Help With Server [LOTS OF PICS]
item.dc:creator: @Jayar1 Jayar_
item.description:
@Jayar1 wrote:

[quote=“DuhPk, post:6, topic:235903”][quote author=Jayar_ link=topic=311157.msg2482076#msg2482076 date=1223594334]

the 192.168.0.101 isn’t your IP go to www.whatismyip.com and replace the 192.168.0.101 with your IP given on that site where you port forwarded
Note: D-Link fails with portfowarding…linksys is recommended

Ok thanks for telling me that now all i need is someone to test out my server (its online)
And
well im just 11 years old a few months ago my dad bought a router so i play cod4 online
and computer.
[/quote]
I’d stick with cod4…once your start p servers you no longer have a life[/quote]
Well i just really wanted to make a server so that my friends could play and also
i just really wanted to be an admin/owner on a server[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2008, 06:29:02 pm[/size][hr][quote=“ziplock, post:2, topic:235903”]Sometimes when you use client the client connect to the wrong port. also if its jared it might connect to port null.[/quote]
do you know how i check my port?

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Server [LOTS OF PICS]
